attributes.action: Give all the England World Cup 2018 squad and staff knighthoods
attributes.background: They just deserve it. All the lads have been excellent representatives for England and done us all proud, so they should be rewarded.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
